more_properties_to_offer: You will be able to share information about any more properties you have to offer when your local authority contacts you
Stepfree_access_hint: Step-free access means that the property entrance and all the rooms your guests will use must be without steps, or include a ramp or lift suitable for wheelchair users.
bedrooms_hint: You must enter at least 1 single or double bedroom. Single bedrooms can normally only contain a single bed. Double bedrooms should have enough space for at least 1 double bed or 2 single beds.
scot_wales_validation_hint: You have entered an address that is not in England or Northern Ireland
home_is_suitable: Do you think your home is suitable?
off_address_heading: Enter the address of the property you're offering
dif_address_heading: Is the property you’re offering at a different address to your home?
new_property_heading: Are you offering any more properties?
how_many_people_heading: How many people normally live in the property you’re offering (not including guests)?
who_offer_heading: Who would you like to offer accommodation to?
how_many_bedrooms_heading: How many bedrooms are available for guests in the property you’re registering now?
step_free_access_heading: Does the property, or any of the properties, have step-free access?
